IRPact_modellierung.distributions

Class ZipfianDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.Distribution
      • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.UnivariateDistribution
        • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.DiscreteDistribution
          • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.COLTDiscreteDistribution
            • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.ZipfianDistribution

  • public class ZipfianDistribution
extends COLTDiscreteDistribution
    Class to model a zipfian distribution based on the COLT library. Models contexts that follow the Zipfian law

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZipfianDistribution

        public ZipfianDistribution(java.lang.String name,
                           double z)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an instance of a Zipfian distribution based on the COLT library. Needs a skew larger than unity of the skew of the distribution it is to model
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the distribution (will be prefixed by ZipfianDistribution_)
        z - The skew of the distribution to model
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - An exception is thrown when the skew of the distribution is not larger than unity, since otherwise the COLT distribution won't terminate

        Draw a value from the distribution according to the distribution at hand
